LAKSHAY GUPTA
Delhi /India | 9772914979 |lakshayanil165@gmail.com
LinkedIn | GitHub
ABOUT
Backend developer with experience in building scalable RESTful APIs using FastAPI, MongoDB, and Dockerized services.
Skilled in JWT/OAuth2 authentication, Google Cloud Platform, CI/CD with GitHub Actions, and deployments on Linux
servers with NGINX.
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
ZYLIFE SMARTCARE PRIVATE LIMITED
NEW DELHI, INDIA
Associate Software Developer
May 2024 – Present
- Build and secure 300+ APIs using Firebase, JWT and OAuth, ensuring robust authentication.
- Integrate third-party services like
- ABHA (healthcare) APIs and
- Google Maps APIs (Distance Matrix, Places) to enable healthcare and location-based features.
- Triggering transaction and service based SMS .
- Encryption using KMS services by Google Cloud
- Manage Linux servers, configure Nginx for reverse proxy, and deploy with SSL.
- Design scalable database schemas and optimize queries with aggregation pipelines.
- Write unit tests using PyTest and implement caching with Redis.
- Use Docker to containerize API projects for efficient deployment.
ZYLIFE SMARTCARE PRIVATE LIMITED
NEW DELHI, INDIA
Flutter Developer Intern
Feb 2024 – May 2024
- Spent the first 2 months learning Flutter and building responsive UI designs.
- Transitioned to learning and developing RESTful APIs using Python and MongoDB.
- Worked on creating FHIR-compliant web applications using HL7 standards.
TECHNICAL SKILLS:
- Programming Languages: Python, C, C++, Dart, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- Frameworks & Libraries: FastAPI, Flutter, BLoC, SQLAlchemy, Alembic, Pydantic, Requests, Bcrypt, Starlette
- Databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Firestore, SQLite, MySQL
- Authentication & Security: JWT, OAuth2
- DevOps & Deployment: Docker, GitHub Actions(CI/CD), Linux, NGINX, Gunicorn
- Tools & Platforms: Git, Postman, Firebase, IDEs, Google Cloud Platform
- Computer Science Fundamentals: Understanding of Data Structures, DBMS and OS
PROJECTS:
SOCIAL MEDIA BACKEND API
Tech Used: FastAPI, PostgreSQL, JWT, Docker, SQLAlchemy, Alembic, GitHub Actions, Pydantic, Pytest
- Developed a fully functional REST API for a social media platform with features like user authentication, post
creation, and like/unlike actions.
- Implemented CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions for automated testing and deployment.
CROSS-PLATFORM NOTES APP
Tech Used: Flutter, Firebase Firestore, SQLite, BLoC
- Developed a cross-platform notes app with cloud sync (Firestore) and offline access (SQLite). Used BLoC for state
management and custom theming for responsive UI.
EDUCATION & OTHER
RAJASTHAN TECHNICAL UNIVERSITY
2020 – 2024
B.Tech. Computer Science Engineering, CGPA 8.3
